testcase.name: Given Add Place Payload with "AHouse" "English" "World cross center"
When User calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "Post" http request
Then the API call is successful with Status code 200
And "status" in response body is "OK"
And "scope" in response body is "APP"
And verify place_Id created maps to "AHouse" using "getPlaceAPI"
| AHouse | English | World cross center |
Given Add Place Payload with "Nagadhama" "Kannada" "Banashankari"
When User calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "Post" http request
Then the API call is successful with Status code 200
And "status" in response body is "OK"
And "scope" in response body is "APP"
And verify place_Id created maps to "Nagadhama" using "getPlaceAPI"
| Nagadhama | Kannada | Banashankari |
Given Add Place Payload with "MariaHouse" "French" "Germany"
When User calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "Post" http request
Then the API call is successful with Status code 200
And "status" in response body is "OK"
And "scope" in response body is "APP"
And verify place_Id created maps to "MariaHouse" using "getPlaceAPI"
| MariaHouse | French | Germany |
